name: GUAR_EMPR_ADDRESS
description: The GUAR_EMPR_ADDRESS table contains information about the address of the guarantor's employer.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_ADDRESS
columns.description: The address of the guarantor's employer.
